code: import React from'react';import MoviesList from'./MoviesList';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SecondaryContainer=()=>{let nowPlayingMovies=useSelector(state=>state.movies.nowPlayingMovies);let popularMovies=useSelector(state=>state.movies.popularMovies);let topRatedMovies=useSelector(state=>state.movies.topRatedMovies);if(!nowPlayingMovies)return;else if(!popularMovies)return;else if(!topRatedMovies)return;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"-mt-40 relative z-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoviesList,{title:'Now Playing',movieList:nowPlayingMovies}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoviesList,{title:'Top Rated',movieList:topRatedMovies}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoviesList,{title:'Popular',movieList:popularMovies}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoviesList,{title:'For you',movieList:nowPlayingMovies}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoviesList,{title:'Thriller movies',movieList:nowPlayingMovies})]});};export default SecondaryContainer;
